changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE user ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, user_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, name VARCHAR(250), last_name VARCHAR(250), CONSTRAINT pk_id PRIMARY KEY (id) );

changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE game ( id BIGINT NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, user_id BIGINT NOT NULL, game_status_id BIGINT NOT NULL, rows INT, colums INT, mines INT, game_date DateTime, CONSTRAINT pk_id PRIMARY KEY (id), CONSTRAINT fk_game_user FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE CONSTRAINT fk_game_gamestatus FOREIGN KEY (game_status_id) REFERENCES game_status(id) ON DELETE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE );
